name: Dread End
description:
Dread End is a first person wave shooter set in a  training facility using state-of-the-art technology to train soldiers. Enter a virtual combat simulation and face the harshest encounters the military has to offer, gather points by eliminating hostile drones with the laser rifle and make it to the top of the rankings!

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Features Virtual Simulation Facility N-ORB

Make this digitally constructed area your playground by utilizing the industrial environment to your advantage.

Hostile Combat Drones

Fight against multiple drone types with unique behaviours and attacks that challenge you in different numbers and groups.

Performance Score System

Your skill matters! Gain points for your ability to take out enemies quickly and with precision. Kills during special movements like jumping and sprinting add bonus points.

Online Ranking Board

Prove your skills and let your name be known among soldiers by reaching high enough scores to make it to the top 10.

Hardware Recommendations: CPU
Intel Core i7-7700Graphics CardNvidia Geforce 1060RAM8GB DDR4

_______________________________________________________________________________________

The Team

We are a team of third semester students of the S4G School for Games in Berlin and wanted to gain experience with the Unreal Engine 4 and improve our skills, hence Dread End came to be.
